title: Cradle: Foundation
description: ***This volume contains the first three novels in the Cradle series: Unsouled, Soulsmith, and Blackflame, all of which are available separately.***  Sacred artists follow a thousand Paths to power, using their souls to control the forces of the natural world.  Lindon is Unsouled, forbidden to learn the sacred arts of his clan.  When faced with a looming fate he cannot ignore, he must rise beyond anything he's ever known...and forge his own Path.
author: Will Wight
